SELECT dm.dlvr_media_nm
FROM check_item ci
JOIN check_item_media_network cimn
ON ci.id = cimn.check_item_id
JOIN media_network mn
ON mn.id = cimn.media_network_id
JOIN dlvr_media dm
ON dm.id = mn.id WHERE
ci.id = #{checkNo}

SELECT n.noti_msg FROM noti_msg n
JOIN check_item c
ON n.id = c.noti_msg_id WHERE
c.id = #{checkNo}

SELECT ac.id as account_seq, adc.id as adComponent_seq, adc.ad_cpnt_nm as adComponentName, ad.id as adProject_seq, cisd.upper_limit_threshold, cisd.lower_limit_threshold, cisd.upper_limit_threshold_rate, cisd.lower_limit_threshold_rate, cisd.data_reference_period
FROM acnt ac
JOIN account_check_item_setting_detail acisd
ON ac.id = acisd.acnt_id
JOIN check_item_setting_detail cisd
ON cisd.id = acisd.check_item_setting_detail_id
JOIN ad_cpnt adc
ON ac.ad_cpnt_id = adc.id
JOIN ad_mttr ad
ON ad.ad_cpnt_id = adc.id WHERE
cisd.check_item_id = #{checkNo}
AND ac.id = #{accountId}

SELECT project.id as adProject_seq, component.ad_cpnt_nm as adComponentName, component.id AS adComponent_seq, account.id as account_Seq FROM
acnt account
JOIN dlvr_media media
ON account.dlvr_media_id = media.id
JOIN ad_mttr project
ON account.ad_mttr_id = project.id
JOIN ad_cpnt component
ON component.id = project.ad_cpnt_id WHERE
component.ad_cpnt_typ_id = #{componentTypeId}
AND component.ad_cpnt_id = #{componentId}
AND media.dlvr_media_nm = #{mediaName}

SELECT #{media}, #{accountId}, mc.月額の予算 as monthBudget FROM acnt ac JOIN dlvr_media dm ON ac.dlvr_media_id = dm.id JOIN ad_cpnt adc ON ac.ad_cpnt_id = adc.id JOIN media_input_bdgt mb ON adc.media_input_bdgt_id = mb.id JOIN 月別予算 mc ON mb.abst_bdgt_id = mc.id WHERE adc.id = #{accountId} AND adc.ad_cpnt_typ_id = #{componentTypeId} AND dm.dlvr_media_nm = #{media} AND mc.年月 = #{execMonth}
